entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries south of Plum Point. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
